project.name: Trommel
project.description: Trommel is a set of tooling for data characterization/profiling targeting Hadoop specifically targeted at data miners/scientists that aren't interested in learning HQL, Pig, or Java MapReduce. At the heart of the Trommel is a compact DSL called TrommelScript specifically designed to make it easy for data miners to characterize, sample, and export data in/from Hadoop.
